snippet.title: New Indie Horror Game: The EdCo Incident | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the finished game here! 
http://www.mediafire.com/file/7cp19n3kbkdckl4/The_EdCo_Incident.zip/file

Check out the new (and final) trailer! https://youtu.be/gyZWYvFqA20

This new indie horror game is about a third of the way done. In a few months, I'll release the Alpha version. Even when the game is complete, it will be free for download. This is because the game is my creative project, and not a money-making production.

 System Requirements: This is an unusual game. Believe it or not, it's platform is Powerpoint. Yep, it's a fully functional and immersive experience too! To play the game, you must have PowerPoint 2007 or newer, a device running Windows, and the capability of playing MP3, WAV, AVI, and MP4 files. These files are common on Windows devices. 

We have a Google+ Community! Feel free to join!
https://plus.google.com/communities/117707741810637906826
